content: The SANER track is now attached to the Public Health track. Information can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-01+SANER+Scenario
Besides Abigail, how many of you readers are planning to participate?
The Connectathon issue of the guide is published at http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-saner/branches/master/index.html
